system.description:
Knights of long-dead magical orders, tacticians specialized in arcane warfare, wielders of ancient weapon-spirits, and students of entities whose battles echo throughout the multiverse. Martialists tap into sources of power that mix magic and combat skill. They may be glorious heroes, brutal villains, pragmatic mercenaries, or even solitary hermits practicing their studies in seclusion. Many war-minded fey, fiends, celestials, and genies traffic with warlocks who become martialists. It has also come to pass that some people forge pacts by coming in contact with certain artifacts such as sentient magic weapons. (The artifacts might even be the patron themselves!)

Expanded Spell List

When you choose a warlock archetype, you also choose an expanded spell list granted by your patron. Choose one patron expanded spell list, either from here, the core rulebook, or elsewhere. These spells count as warlock spells for you.

Brutality

  • 1st: force punch, phantasmal talons

  • 2nd: enlarge/reduce, invigorated strikes

  • 3rd: crushing haymaker, vampiric touch

  • 4th: fire shield, rage of the meek

  • 5th: arcane hand, storm kick

Tactics

  • 1st: calculated retribution, shield

  • 2nd: force of will, misty step

  • 3rd: bestow curse, counterspell

  • 4th: freedom of movement, resilient sphere

  • 5th: telepathic bond, warrior's instincts

You gain the follow features at warlock levels

WARLOCK LEVEL - FEATURES

  • 1st - Eldritch Armament

  • 6th - Battlefield Maestro

  • 10th - Warrior's Resolve

  • 14th - Eldritch Armor
